alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Coastal Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 08 at 3:26PM EST until January 09 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. * WHERE...In North Carolina, Coastal Brunswick, Coastal New Hanover, and Coastal Pender Counties. In South Carolina, Coastal Georgetown and Coastal Horry Counties. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: Remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Watch for falling debris and tree limbs. Use caution if you must drive.
